thread.title: CLT gets pair of direct flights to Caribbean
thread.title_full: CLT gets pair of direct flights to Caribbean

author: Jen Wilson
title: CLT gets pair of direct flights to Caribbean
text:
Already a subscriber? Sign In Here Charlotte-area residents with an eye on a Caribbean vacation this winter will be able to fly directly from their hometown airport as American Airlines Group Inc. adds nonstop service to two new destinations from Charlotte Douglas International Airport . Booking will be available starting July 20 for weekly, nonstop flights from CLT to Curacao International Airport on the Dutch Caribbean island and to Gregorio Luperon International Airport in Puerto Plata, Dominican Republic. Service begins Dec. 19 for the new routes, which will operate on Saturdays, with passengers flying aboard an Airbus A319.
